channel.title: Projects on MapLibre
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on MapLibre

item.title: MapLibre GL JS
item.description: Open-source TypeScript library for publishing maps on your website. Fast displaying of maps is possible thanks to GPU-accelerated vector tile rendering. MapLibre GL JS originated as an open-source fork of mapbox-gl-js and MapLibre GL JS v1 is fully compatible with Mapbox GL JS v1.

item.title: MapLibre GL Native
item.description: Open-source SDK for Android and iOS allowing displaying maps inside of your mobile applications, desktop application, or embedded devices. This toolset grants fast maps displaying in iOS and Android apps using the same GPU-based acceleration as the TypeScript version.

item.title: maplibre-rs
item.description: maplibre-rs, an experimental project, is a portable and performant vector maps renderer. We aim to support web, mobile and desktop applications. This is achieved by the novel WebGPU specification. Plenty of native implementations are already implementing this specification.

item.title: Additional Projects
item.description: Binding for additional languages (such as React.js, Vue) and external libraries. Plugins extending the functionality of the core SDKs. awesome-maplibre on GitHub Plugins for MapLibre GL JS All MapLibre GitHub repositories
